origin.aetherborn.aetherborn.name: Aerborn
origin.aetherborn.aetherborn.description: Related to the Elytrian, the Aerborn are their Aether native cousins.
power.aetherborn.aether_armor_only.name: Warrior of the Aether
power.aetherborn.aether_armor_only.descr: You are a warrior of the Aether, and only armor from the Aether fits you.
power.aetherborn.spawn_in_aether.name: Aether Native
power.aetherborn.spawn_in_aether.descrip: You are a native to the Aether, and spawn inside it.
power.aetherborn.fast_flying.name: Float on
power.aetherborn.fast_flying.description: You are easily propelled by the wind, moving great distances in the air.
power.aetherborn.extreme_hunger.name: Insatiable
power.aetherborn.extreme_hunger.descript: You need to eat far more frequently than any other creature.
power.aetherborn.launch_into_air.name: Wind Launch
power.aetherborn.launch_into_air.descrip: You can fly into the air, just like your elytrian cousins, but with a far shorter cooldown.
power.aetherborn.aetherian_diet.name: Aetherian Diet
power.aetherborn.aetherian_diet.descript: Being of the Aether, you can only digest foods from your natural habitat.
power.aetherborn.weak_on_ground.name: Grounded Weakness
power.aetherborn.weak_on_ground.descript: When not in the air, you take extra damage.
power.aetherborn.low_defense.name: Wispy Nature
power.aetherborn.low_defense.description: Being an aetherian creature, you have slightly lower defense.
